name: Transparent Hands USA
mission: Conduct free life-saving surgeries/medical treatments for poor people all across Pakistan through its transparent crowdfunding online healthcare platform.
theoryOfChange: By using a transparent crowdfunding model, the organization connects global donors directly to verified patient cases to fund life-saving medical interventions that the local public health system or personal finances cannot cover.

grantsData.purpose: SURGERIES OF POOR PATIENTS IN PAKISTAN

zakatClaimEvidence: Transparent Hands is registered in the US, UK, and Pakistan. Pay your Zakat, donation at www.tranparenthands.org/ramadan-donation-plan/. Additionally, Transparent Hands allows users from all over the world to donate Zakat, Sadaqah, and other forms of donations to needy patients in Pakistan while ensuring complete transparency. (Source: https://transparenthands.org/basket-listing)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Good donor alignment with manageable risk. Evidence quality is solid but still evolving in places.

components.evidence: Accepts zakat (+2); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Humanitarian service (+2)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

components.improvement_suggestion: Expand services to underserved populations or geographies with limited nonprofit coverage.
components.name: Underserved Space

alignment.rationale: Alignment 36/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.evidence: Beneficiary count appears implausible; CPB excluded pending review
components.improvement_suggestion: Publish beneficiary counts consistently so cost-effectiveness can be assessed.
components.name: Cost Per Beneficiary

components.improvement_suggestion: Build reserves toward your board-approved target range (often 3-12 months), adjusted for revenue volatility and obligations.
components.name: Financial Health

score_details.score_summary: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC shows strong alignment and moderate impact, with zakat compliance.

zakat.claim_evidence: Transparent Hands is registered in the US, UK, and Pakistan. Pay your Zakat, donation at www.tranparenthands.org/ramadan-donation-plan/. Additionally, Transparent Hands allows users from all over the world to donate Zakat, Sadaqah, and other forms of donations to needy patients in Pakistan while ensuring complete transparency. (Source: https://transparenthands.org/basket-listing)

all_citations.claim: The charity has a score of 89.75/100, a 72.0% program expense ratio, 1.0 months of working capital, and a fundraising efficiency of $0.23 per $1 raised.
Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC reported a total revenue of $584,685.
The charity is ZAKAT-ELIGIBLE and provides various donation options for medical procedures.
The organization engages the community through volunteer opportunities and direct patient support stories.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a 60/100 GMG score due to its high alignment with humanitarian causes and direct service impact, though its overall score is moderated by limited financial reserves.
areas_for_improvement: Limited working capital of 1.0 months indicates a tight liquidity position
Opportunity to improve impact reporting to provide more granular cost-per-beneficiary data

dimension_explanations.alignment: The organization shows high alignment with donor interests, particularly within the Muslim community, as it is ZAKAT-ELIGIBLE and addresses urgent humanitarian needs [3]. Its fundraising efficiency of $0.23 per $1 raised demonstrates a productive approach to securing resources for its mission in Pakistan [1]. The alignment score of 36/50 highlights its strong track record and the high urgency of the medical cause it serves [1][4].
dimension_explanations.impact: The charity demonstrates a direct service impact by facilitating surgical and medical treatments for those in need [1]. With a program expense ratio of 72.0%, the organization efficiently directs its $584,685 in total revenue toward patient care [2]. However, the impact score of 24/50 reflects a need for more comprehensive data regarding long-term outcomes and cost-per-beneficiary metrics [1].

baseline_narrative.headline: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC provides life-saving surgical and medical treatments to underprivileged patients in Pakistan through a transparent crowdfunding platform.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 72.0% ensuring the majority of funds reach patients
Strong Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100 indicating solid accountability
Direct service model with a clear focus on high-urgency humanitarian medical needs
baseline_narrative.summary: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC operates as a healthcare-focused nonprofit that partners with numerous hospitals across Pakistan to provide free surgeries and medical procedures [1]. In the 2023 fiscal year, the organization reported a total revenue of $584,685 to support its humanitarian mission [2]. The charity is recognized as ZAKAT-ELIGIBLE, offering donors a verified pathway to fulfill their religious obligations through medical service [3].

all_citations.quote: Programs: Free Surgeries, Cochlear Implant Program

all_citations.claim: Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid

rich_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a 60/100 GMG score due to its high alignment with humanitarian causes and direct service impact, though its overall score is moderated by limited financial reserves.

areas_for_improvement.context: The organization maintains only <cite id="1">1.0 months of working capital</cite>, which may limit its ability to sustain operations during revenue fluctuations.
With a <cite id="2">board size of only 3 members</cite>, the charity has a minimal governance structure compared to larger peers.

bbb_assessment.summary: The organization provides audited financials but does not currently have a BBB Wise Giving Alliance rating.

case_against.summary: The primary concerns involve <cite id="1">low working capital</cite> and a <cite id="2">declining 3-year revenue trend</cite>.

confidence.data_freshness: Data current as of 2023 tax year
confidence.notes: Strong alignment between third-party ratings and internal financial reporting.

known_gaps: Small board size limits governance score

alignment.explanation: Strong fit for Muslim donors as a <cite id="3">Zakat-eligible organization</cite> serving <cite id="6">vulnerable populations in Pakistan</cite>.
alignment.improvement: The charity could <cite id="9">expand services to more remote geographies</cite> with even more limited nonprofit coverage to increase its 'underserved space' score.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust this charity due to its <cite id="7">Platinum Seal of Transparency</cite> and a <cite id="1">89/100 accountability score</cite>.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility, the charity could expand its <cite id="2">board of directors</cite> beyond the current three members to enhance independent oversight.

impact.explanation: The charity maintains a <cite id="2">72.0% program expense ratio</cite> and provides <cite id="5">direct surgical interventions</cite> that address high-urgency medical needs.
impact.improvement: Impact measurement would benefit from <cite id="9">publishing consistent beneficiary counts</cite> to allow for a standardized cost-per-beneficiary assessment.

donor_fit_matrix.evidence_rigor: Grade B - Verified outcomes with Candid Platinum status

grantmaking_profile.grant_strategy: Funds surgical procedures through a single primary implementing partner in Pakistan

rich_narrative.headline: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC provides life-saving surgical and medical treatments to underprivileged patients in Pakistan through a transparent crowdfunding platform.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to fund specific, tangible medical procedures for individual patients in Pakistan through a transparent, Zakat-eligible platform.
donor_motivations: Want to see exactly which patient their money is helping
Prioritize high-urgency medical interventions like surgeries
Value third-party transparency seals like Candid Platinum
Seek to fulfill Zakat through healthcare services
giving_considerations: The organization is currently experiencing a revenue contraction
Small board size means governance is concentrated
Financial reserves are lean, making the charity sensitive to donation timing
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking large-scale institutional health policy reform or those who prefer organizations with massive financial endowments.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: The charity tracks <cite id="7">two specific outcome metrics</cite> and has a <cite id="9">verified evidence and outcomes status</cite>.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Transparent Hands uses a crowdfunding platform to connect global donors directly to the surgical needs of impoverished patients, verified by hospital partnerships.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that surgical interventions lead to long-term health improvements for patients.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: With <cite id="2">revenue declining by 11.9%</cite> and a <cite id="9">high funding gap</cite>, the charity can absorb significant new capital to restore its previous scale.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Maintains a <cite id="1">$0.23 fundraising efficiency</cite> which is competitive, though its <cite id="2">72.0% program ratio</cite> is below the <cite id="9">peer median of 88.2%</cite>.
similar_orgs: Mercy USA for Aid and Development

similar_organizations.differentiator: Much larger healthcare institution in Pakistan
similar_organizations.name: Indus Hospital
Mercy USA for Aid and Development

strengths.detail: The organization holds an <cite id="1">Accountability & Finance score of 89/100</cite> and has earned the <cite id="7">Candid Platinum Seal</cite> for its commitment to data sharing.
Transparent Hands directs a <cite id="2">72.0% program expense ratio</cite> toward medical services, ensuring the majority of funds reach patients.
The charity demonstrates high efficiency in resource mobilization, spending only <cite id="1">$0.23 to raise every $1</cite> in donations.

strengths_deep_dive: Transparent Hands excels in organizational culture and leadership, receiving <cite id="1">perfect scores of 100 in both Culture & Community and Leadership & Adaptability</cite> from Charity Navigator. This internal strength supports a direct service model that successfully <cite id="8">transferred $414,000 in foreign grants</cite> to implementing partners in Pakistan during 2023. Their focus on <cite id="5">preventive healthcare sessions and medical camps</cite> complements their surgical interventions, creating a holistic approach to community health in underserved regions.
rich_narrative.summary: Transparent Hands Foundation (US) INC is a specialized healthcare nonprofit that leverages a crowdfunding model to provide <cite id="1">free surgeries and medical procedures</cite> for underprivileged patients in Pakistan. By partnering with a network of hospitals, the organization facilitates high-urgency interventions including <cite id="5">cochlear implants and cardiac surgeries</cite>. In the 2023 fiscal year, the charity managed <cite id="2">$584,685 in total revenue</cite>, primarily driven by public contributions. The organization maintains a <cite id="1">four-star rating from Charity Navigator</cite> with an <cite id="1">overall score of 89.75/100</cite>, reflecting a strong commitment to accountability and transparency. Transparent Hands is <cite id="3">Zakat-eligible</cite>, serving the <cite id="6">fuqara (poor) and masakin (needy)</cite> asnaf categories through direct medical service delivery. Their model is designed to bridge the healthcare gap for those who cannot afford life-saving treatments, utilizing a <cite id="7">Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid</cite> to build donor trust through verified outcome tracking.
